head.supplied: 20/9/83. ¶ ¶ Let me reiterate, ¶ dear Mr Macdonald, that I will be happy to serve geographic interests in the new Society here, by affording advise or information, whenever sought, altho' I find mys...

div.p: Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Victorian Branch), box 52(a), Royal Historical Society of Victoria, Melbourne.
M's letter, together with various other documents relating to the founding of the Victorian Branch of the RGSA, has been inserted at the front of the Branch's first minute book. 20/9/83.

Let me reiterate,
See M to A. Macdonald, 9 August 1883. dear Mr Macdonald, that I will be happy to serve geographic interests in the new Society here, by affording advise or information, whenever sought, altho' I find myself not free, to enter on any active administrative duties.
